labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Certain sections of each person's camera feed freeze up, mainly on the left and right hand sides
data.expected_result: The video chat should work without having to disable hardware acceleration
data.short_description: Video chat with 3+ users causes screen tearing with hardware acceleration enabled
data.steps_to_repro: - enable hardware acceleration - enter video call with more than 2 people - video feeds freeze in sections for all users - disable hardware acceleration and restart - no more tearing and freezing, works as expected
